actions.text: Read second time and referred to Senate Committee on Veterans.

official_title: A bill to amend title 38, United States Code, to revise and clarify eligibility for reimbursement of expenses, of travel for Veteran's Administration health care, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Excludes from repayment the first $5 of travel expenses to and from a Veterans' Administration facility for medical care except for veterans with service-connected disabilities of 50 percent or more.

titles.title: A bill to amend title 38, United States Code, to revise and clarify eligibility for reimbursement of expenses, of travel for Veteran's Administration health care, and for other purposes.
